page.title: 10A page about farming.
page.content:
The vast majority of the land area is used for agriculture and it is an important source of local{employment.} Farms are mostly arable with{wheat}and {barley}being the main crops.{Potatoes, {oilseed rape}and{sugar beet}are also grown. There is a good deal of intensively managed grassland used for {cattle}and{sheep}grazing or for{silage and{hay.}Rolleston has a{pig farm}and there are some smallholders there who combine animal and arable farming.
Members of the{farming community}meet socially at the Young Farmers' Club or the Agricultural Society both situated at Southwell.
Many of the local farmers and their employees receive training at Brackenhurst Agriultural College, Southwell.
